recipes.label: A Change of Premises?
recipes.startdescription: We could move our base of operations here, if we so choose.

recipes.label: A Second Self?
recipes.startdescription: If this expedition succeeds, the I-that-is-not-I will be there to perform the Forms. [If you succeed, you'll reap the usual rewards, and also progress your Change ascension.]

recipes.label: Preparations for an Expedition?
recipes.startdescription: If I add at least one Funds, I can begin the Expedition. [Expeditions need at least one Funds per obstacle. Followers will defeat obstacles. If you run out of Funds or Followers, the Expedition ends.]

recipes.label: Preparations for an Expedition?
recipes.startdescription: If I add a Follower, I can begin the Expedition. [Expeditions need at least one Funds per obstacle. Followers will defeat obstacles. If you run out of Funds or Followers, the Expedition ends.]

recipes.label: Preparations for an Expedition?
recipes.startdescription: I could send an Expedition here to find books, treasures, tools of power. But I'll need Followers to send, and Funds to supply them.

recipes.label: The Old Form and the New
recipes.startdescription: [If you have the Dancer expansion, you can use this combination to find a job at the Ecdysis club, and pursue the Change ascensions.]

recipes.label: A Disinterment?
recipes.startdescription: I'll need to deploy my own strength, or that of a friend.
